Easy app to help you to convert many different currencies.

To help you in travel or saving in exchanges, this app provides you a quick way to see the conversion of your preferred currencies.

Don't lose any good conversion rate any more, Quick Currency Converter shows your favorites conversions on your home screen using Quick Currency Converter widget.

Found a good exchange rate and want to share it with friends or families?
You can easily use the share option and share the currency conversion that you like with your preferred IM app or e-mail.
